LocalizationMap.Term: An error occurred while getting a file from Elvis because of a lost connection. (S1144)#EOL##EOL#Please contact your system administrator.#EOL##EOL#IMPORTANT: We strongly advise to stop working on ANY of the files in the system until the connection is restored again and to not perform ANY action such as abort check-out, check-in, save version, check-out, opening files or Dossiers and so on.#EOL##EOL#Continuing to work on the files in any way can result in data loss or corrupted files.
